Description.Details:
Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. The Rocket Launcher 20 fires twenty unguided rockets. Rocket Launchers suffer a to hit penalty over missile launchers and do not receieve the positive or negative modifiers that affect missiles.

Missile weapons have a negative accuracy modifier that is percentage based and applied after the standard To Hit chance is calculated. Rocket Launcher weapons accuracy modifier is not affected by a Narc Missile Beacon, however will be negatively affected by Anti Missile Systems.
